website_summaries.verdict: Amazing features on this product. Worth the extra money.
pros: This is a piece of furniture that gives you everything you need for a great viewing experience, but can double as a regular couch
Includes a fold-down table in the middle of a full-sized couch
Table includes two 110-volt outlets as well as USB charging ports
Storage in the arm rests includes a hydraulic lift
cons: The cost of this home theater seating is higher than other models

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Seats for the Price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these for my theater room. They are very well made especially the quality of the leather. These are great if you never expect to pack your theater but want to have that center seat available in case you do. The assembly was easy, but I did contact the seller just to make sure I did not damage the seats, when attaching the backs. There are very basic instructions (one page on assembly, nothing on operation or warranty). They responded very quickly and were professional. I was apprehensive to spend this much money on seats sight unseen. I am very happy I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, beautiful leather
customer_reviews.text: This product is more than I expected. Great quality, beautiful leather, and incredibly comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: ramona

customer_reviews.title: Perfection and attention to detail! Just like my Aircrft.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this “Mothership” !! I have a pilot lounge inside my Aircrft hangar and I’m become a very popular guy after this masterpiece arrived. Shop around at your local furniture stores, you’ll be back here reading this same review thinking this guys right! (I’m just trying to save you some of your valuable time) Chad K
customer_reviews.author: Chad K.

customer_reviews.title: extremely comfortable. However
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday, extremely comfortable. However, one recliner just stopped receiving power and is stuck in the reclined position. Can anyone help? I have checked the plots and outlets....
customer_reviews.author: William Maier

customer_reviews.title: Glad I BOUGHT IT
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought furniture online or site unseen. I was very worried I wouldn't like the leather texture. I shouldn't have worried, it's awesome. I love the sofa and even bought 2 reclining chairs to go with it. The leather is soft, but not sinkable soft, and the top-drop down is great. I can charge my phone while I'm watching tv. The company was great to work with and very responsive to any questions I had. I'm very happy with this product and hope to be for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: William Halvorsen Jr

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding sofa!!  Well worth the expense!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my finished basement and wanted to use it for a few months before doing a review. This sofa is extremely comfortable and the controls are easy to use. It seems that it will hold up for a long time. I love the quality leather they used and I really enjoy the middle console that allows you to plug in devices and even wirelessly charge phones. This is a superb sofa and well worth the money spent. The ONLY thing I would want added is something to keep the cords organized in the back. My power strip keeps falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Padraig Clark

customer_reviews.title: It’s a beautiful and comfortable piece. Great quality.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Beautiful piece of furniture. Comfortable. I haven’t contacted anyone yet, but the light for one of the cup holders is not working. Hope to get this resolved. I will then update to a 5 star when issue is resolved.
customer_reviews.author: PAR

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy couch, good design
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable couches I have ever sat on. Nice design, nice features. I love how the back comes off easy to allow for transportation and door width clearance. My only complaint is that the lights in the headrest didn’t work, and had no luck getting help from customer support. I will probably never use those lights anyways so it isn’t worth the return hassle.
customer_reviews.author: david baggott

customer_reviews.title: Not for average size person.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5' 6" and it's just too big for me. If I were 6' 5" it would probably be great. Can't get comfortable. Arm rests are high, seat depth is long, head rest is way up there. Seats are very wide as well. Works fine and looks great, but it doesn't fit me. Live and learn I suppose. Sometimes it pays to try it on before you buy!
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: great seating, very good quality
customer_reviews.text: This seating finished my home theater nicely; very comfy, solidly built and well thought out. The only bad thing is that it is really difficult to convince myself to get out of it and turn the TV off
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: High Quality, wroth it.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome, looks and feels high quality. Slight edge mark left on sofa from the way it was packaged. A sharp metal piece was laying on the soft seat and the mark will not Go away.
customer_reviews.author: David Serna

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: Great couch, love the auto lift and head rest. Easy to assemble but very heavy. The leather is very soft.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: leather is more expensive, but think it will be more durable;
customer_reviews.text: Love the fold down table with power, USB and lights. Also like the arm rest tables. Stitching on front top edge of cushions is not aligned with adjacent cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerJeffHVT

customer_reviews.title: Great unit
customer_reviews.text: I have had this sofa for over a year now and its GREAT. No issues whatsoever, quality is good, very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: JChap

customer_reviews.title: Great design and a lot of cool features.
customer_reviews.text: When I was shopping for new seats for my home I had a list of requirements: • Real leather • High quality structure • Beautiful Seatcraft Republic has it all and more! A very stylish design with a lot of cool features! The only issue now is that my kids will spend every minute they are home on my couch! 😅
customer_reviews.author: Clevis

customer_reviews.title: Customer Support from MFG is amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had a tear in the leather when it arrived on hinge for the drop down table. I called Mellisa with the MFG and she shipped a replacement table the same day. Thank you Melissa!!!! Will definitely purchase Seatcraft products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: MOST COMFORTABLE COUCH EVER!! Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Love this couch! So comfortable and convenient to have middle fold down table and chargers as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shiela

customer_reviews.title: these people took care of me
customer_reviews.text: I had an intial problem, charger did not work, taken care of in a very timely manner, this company is great, very comfortable seats!
customer_reviews.author: Jean Manning

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality all around!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful leather and excellent workmanship. Very quiet and smooth reclining.
customer_reviews.author: CelticPrussian

customer_reviews.title: Theater Double Seat
customer_reviews.text: The seats are very sturdy and comfortable. To relax just push a button. The follow up from the Company is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Sassy 👍
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it’s very easy to assemble. Regina Yacap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product ever purchased and it works perfectly well. The seller is approachable and very talented responding to issues or questions.
customer_reviews.author: Michael O. Fasere

customer_reviews.title: Middle console not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Great couch but the electronic part of the middle drop down console is completely different than described or pictured.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, you are in good hands!
customer_reviews.text: Worked with John Jasso to get my seats and parts and couldn't be happier. They will do the right thing and make your home theater awesome. Don't hesitate! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Satan is amazons photographer.
customer_reviews.text: I would have purchased this but I don’t have the money. Also the reflection in the photo makes me 100% sure that satan took the pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Hauber

product_meta.title: Seatcraft Republic Home Theater Seating - Top Grain Leather - Power Recline - Power Headrest - Center Fold Down Table - Cupholders - AC, USB, Wireless Charging - in Arm Storage (Sofa, Black)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Seatcraft Republic sofa and Loveseat collectionthe Seatcraft Republic home theater seat boasts a striking look that will accommodate guests for years to come. This seat is constructed from grade 7000 leather, for a luxurious sheen that is picked from the top third of all hides. The seat backs of the Republic are firmly bolstered, with adjustable power headrests that let you find and switch positions with the simple push of a button. The contrast stitching running across the chair gives it a sense of character. Ambient base lighting adds an azure marquee accent, while lighted cup holders keep beverages secure and within arm's reach. Each Armrest flips up to reveal plenty of in-arm storage for an easy cleanup of essential items after use. An accessory mount attached to the Armrest expands the range of Entertainment opportunities at your fingertips, by letting you attach any number of exciting accessories including wine glass caddies, tablets, reading lights and more. Taken together, its eye-catching look and plethora of features make the Republic a must-have among the Seatcraft line.features: top grain leather power recliners> adjustable powered headrest center fold-down table with charging station and cup holders> hidden in-arm storage compartments> ambient lighted cup holders> USB charging> wall Hugger reclineitem specifications: sofa Dimensions: 44" h x 83" W x 38" d fully reclined: 65" d wall Hugger: 6"package includes: 1 x sofa 2 x tray tablesassembly: furniture arrives Partially assembled with backrests detached for easy-moving
feature_bullets: ✅ THE FINEST MATERIAL: Painstakingly, hand-selected genuine top grain leather from the top 30% quality of hides, for the finest touch, look, and durability
✅ TOP-IN-CLASS COMFORT: Experience the dream-level of comfort like never before with the powered recline, adjustable powered headrest, and recline reset function all at your fingertips

✅ HOME THEATER SEATING: Enjoy the movie theater experience in your own home with convenient features such as the center storage console that includes two lighted cup holders, AC/USB charging and overhead lights, hidden in-arm storage
✅ Dimensions: Width 84", Height 43", Depth (upright) 37", Depth (fully reclined) 65"

🚚 NOTE: Complimentary curbside delivery included. For inside delivery and assembly, please send us a message before you order. Your furniture will be smartly shipped with reinforced protection to ensure safe journey to your home

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars29 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
